fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Howdy,

{{ content_object.user.get_full_name }} ({{ content_object.user.email }}) is using Repower at Home to save energy, and wants you to join in.

Click here to accept your invitation to Repower at Home

Within the next ten years, the U.S. can reduce building energy use by 23%, saving more than one trillion dollars every year and making bills more affordable for families. Repower at Home helps communities realize this potential. By creating an account, you can:

  • Find important info about the best steps you can take to save energy in your home.
  • Access easy-to-use tools that will inspire your community to join you in saving energy.
  • Link up with efficiency leaders across the country.
  • Track your community's progress towards better homes and cleaner air.
{% if note %}

Here's what {{ content_object.user.first_name }} wants you to know about Repower at Home:
{{ note|safe }}

{% endif %}

Get started today — it’s free!

Sign up at repowerathome.com

Cheers,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Invite
fields.subject: Invitation from {{ content_object.user.get_full_name }} to Repower at Home

Click here to RSVP

{% if note %}

Here's what {{ content_object.user.first_name }} wants you to know:
{{ note|safe }}

{% endif %}

Later,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
